About Low-Key Hideaway
Learn how a former TV producer used his creative flair to turn Low-Key Hideaway into a standout getaway spot in Cedar Key, FL.
Revitalizing a Gem: The Story of Low-Key Hideaway & Tiki Bar
Scott Larsen began his creative journey as a TV producer in California, making a significant impact on popular shows like Wipeout and Fear Factor. His innovative approach to entertainment has brought a fresh and exciting atmosphere to the Low-Key Hideaway & Tiki Bar since 2022, infusing the venue with his unique flair for creativity.
​
Scott and Carrie arrived in Cedar Key during a road trip in January 2022. They stopped by the Low-Key Hideaway & Tiki Bar and by the end of the weekend, Scott had purchased the establishment with just a handshake. They returned in March 2022 to take over, and the rest is history!
​
Over the years, Low-Key Hideaway has endured the wrath of multiple storms—including Hurricane Debbie, Hurricane Idalia, and most recently, Hurricane Helene. After Idalia caused extensive damage to the motel, Scott saw an opportunity to remodel the units and refresh the property. Tragically, Hurricane Helene followed and washed away everything that had just been redone. Despite these setbacks, Scott has remained committed to restoring and reimagining one of Cedar Key's most iconic venues.
​
Low-Key Hideaway has long been a standout in our charming town, and we’re excited about what the future holds. With our new offerings—including a Free Tiki Taxi, delectable meals from the Tiki Taste Tour Food Truck, scenic Sunset Cruises, and thrilling Airboat Tours—we’re eager to welcome you and showcase the best of Cedar Key, FL. Come experience what makes us unique!
Book Now

Book your next Event at Low Key Hideaway & Tiki Bar
Your Pet Friendly 21+ Oasis in Charming Cedar Key, FL
Book Now
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
Book your next Event
Host your next unforgettable event at Low Key Hideaway — where the laid-back vibes meet stunning waterfront views. We offer free venue space for private gatherings, celebrations, and group events for guests 21 and over. Let us help you create a one-of-a-kind experience in the heart of the Nature Coast!
Tiki Taxi
Want to enjoy some drinks without the worry of driving? Whether you’re passing through, staying at our RV Park or Motel, or lodging elsewhere in town, we offer a FREE taxi service to pick you up and bring you back safely!
Tiki Taste Tour
Our on-property food truck provides a diverse selection of options for our guests. View our menu to decide what you want before you arrive.
View Menu
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
Boat Tours
Discover the best of Cedar Key with our range of boat tours. Enjoy a breathtaking sunset cruise, rent a boat with a captain and bartender for an exciting afternoon adventure to North Key Island, or explore the tranquil coastline on our unique airboat tour. Adventure awaits you whatever you choose to do!
Music Venue
Year-round, we host some of our favorite local bands. You can enjoy live music on our stage every Friday, Saturday, and Sunday, 52 weeks a year. You can inquire about performing at our venue or view our upcoming shows.
View Calendar

Book Now
